data.name: Red Solstice 2: Survivors Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Piotr Musiał, a composer famous for his many well-known projects, is now bringing the Red Solstice 2: Survivors soundtrack to life, including over 15 tracks.

Enjoy a variety of different styles played on dark, modern synthesizers backed by a rich and powerful orchestral arrangement and inspired by the sound of sci-fi movies from the 80s and early 90s.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Enjoy the full soundtrack of Red Solstice 2: Survivors including over 15 tracks from the famous composer Piotr Musiał.
